abstract: The carmaker said reports of continued acceleration problems after a repair could be traced to improper work.
snippet: The carmaker said reports of continued acceleration problems after a repair could be traced to improper work.
lead_paragraph: Toyota said on Monday that some cases of sudden unintended acceleration still occurring in vehicles that had been repaired might have been the result of fixes being done incorrectly.

headline.main: Toyota Says Its Repairs Work, Done Properly
headline.print_headline: Toyota Says Its Repairs Work, Done Properly
